name: The Lost Continent Discovery
description: Discover the legendary Lost Continent hidden beyond the misty seas!
Uncover ancient civilizations and their forgotten treasures.
‚Ä¢ Access to unique biomes and creatures

dialogs.start: Legends speak of a continent lost to time, hidden beyond the endless mists.
dialogs.preparation: Such a journey requires careful preparation. The seas are treacherous.
dialogs.discovery: By the gods! The legends were true! This continent holds wonders beyond imagination!
dialogs.exploration: These ruins are older than our oldest records. What civilization built this?
dialogs.guardian: The guardian awakens! It has protected these secrets for millennia!
dialogs.complete: You've made the greatest discovery in recorded history! The Lost Continent is real!
